column5: I'm already jonesing for open water trout again so I thought I'd share some great flyfishing videos for those looking for entertainment.
Nice video! Miss those days when it was refreshing to get wet
ya we rented that film in the summer, great fishing, but doesn't deserve a film making award.

Doesn't deserve a film making award?  I'm gonna guess you watched it with your eyes closed.....  That was a breakthrough film as far as fly fishing, and fishing films in general goes.  Seemed fitting that the Fly Fishing Film Tour would give them the award.
Like I said, amazing fishing and some good camera work, but it doesn't deserve a FILM award. Films should be stories, not just shot after shot of big fish.
Its a story about a mouse
Looks like a whole lota fun!
Give solopaddler 6-7 gopros and im pretty sure he could tell a story better then an imax film. Still, those vids posted were awesome!!!

Like I said, amazing fishing and some good camera work, but it doesn't deserve a FILM award. Films should be stories, not just shot after shot of big fish.  I see what you're getting at, but the award it won was for being voted as best film in the Drake Magazine Fly Fishing Film Competition...

I see what you're getting at, but the award it won was for being voted as best film in the Drake Magazine Fly Fishing Film Competition... And that was a mistake on their part. Just look at the films in IF4 this year.

And that was a mistake on their part. Just look at the films in IF4 this year.  And I'm sure one of them will take the award this year.  Once In A Blue Moon won the award in 2009.  Different films every year.
Yup, I'm sure that year it was one of the best, but compared to some of the stuff out now...
This one is quite possibly the best flyfishing video Ive ever watched . If yoiu can find the full vid I highly recommend it.
That was pretty cool! Especially the very end, LOL.
You should see the whole movie
